thread.title: Staying inside inside a peace of history!!!
thread.title_full: Staying inside inside a peace of history!!! - Review of Le Dokhan’s, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Samar Z
title: Staying inside inside a peace of history!!!
text: Great place , magnificent architecture , and a the Champaign tasting is a must. The rooms are a bit too small for my liking , and although the charming LV trunk elevator is great , but they need to fix it so it can be practical as well.
